name: Daidara-Bocchi
effectText: Cannot be Special Summoned. You can Tribute Summon this card face-up by Tributing 1 Zombie monster. Gains 200 ATK for each Zombie monster you control, except this card. At the start of your Main Phase 1, if you have this card, and 2 or more Zombie monsters other than "Daidara-Bocchi", in your GY: You can discard 1 card; add this card to your hand.
